title: Submit UnionPay verification for a business license

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: bc_id
parameters.description: Business Center ID. You need to have Admin permission for the Business Center. To obtain the list of Business Centers where you have Admin permission, use /bc/get/ and ensure the returned user_role is ADMIN .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Ad account ID. You need to specify the ID of the ad account associated with the business license that requires UnionPay verification and have Admin permission for the ad account.

parameters.name: representative_name
parameters.description: The Chinese name of the legal representative as it appears on the business license.

parameters.name: representative_document_type
parameters.description: The type of the representative document. Enum values: ID_CARD : ID card. PASSPORT : Passport. HK_MACAO_EXIT_ENTRY_PERMIT : Exit-Entry Permit for Travelling to and from Hong Kong and Macao. TAIWAN_MAINLAND_TRAVEL_PERMIT : Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents. HK_MACAO_MAINLAND_TRAVEL_PERMIT : Mainland Travel Permit for Hong Kong and Macao Residents. Default value: ID_CARD .

parameters.name: representative_id
parameters.description: The ID of the representative document. When representative_document_type is ID_CARD or not passed, specify the ID card number of the legal representative in 18 digits. Example: 234123190101012345 . When representative_document_type is PASSPORT , specify the alphanumeric ID of the passport. Example: EF1234567 . When representative_document_type is HK_MACAO_EXIT_ENTRY_PERMIT , specify the alphanumeric ID card number of the Exit-Entry Permit for Travelling to and from Hong Kong and Macao. Example: CA1234567 . When representative_document_type is TAIWAN_MAINLAND_TRAVEL_PERMIT , specify the numeric ID of the Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents. Example: 12345678 . When representative_document_type is HK_MACAO_MAINLAND_TRAVEL_PERMIT , specify the alphanumeric ID Mainland Travel Permit for Hong Kong and Macao Residents. Example: H12345678 .

parameters.name: unionpay_account
parameters.description: The UnionPay account number in 12 to 19 digits.

parameters.name: representative_phone_number
parameters.description: The phone number of the legal representative in 11 digits. Example: 13812345678 .
